com.kromatik.dasshy.core.engine.impl

Class AbstractEngine<T extends IEngineConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kromatik.dasshy.core.engine.impl.AbstractEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - engine's configuration
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEngine<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DasshyServer

    public abstract class AbstractEngine<T extends IEngineConfiguration>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEngine<T>
    Base abstract class for all running engines. Provides standardized ways of configuring the engines, injecting dependencies on bootstrap and running the engine
    See Also:
    IEngine
